flavorText.text:
きせつふうに　ながされて
せかいを　いっしゅうしてしまう。
とちゅうで　わたほうしを　ばらまく。

どんな　かぜに　あおられても
わたげを　じざいに　あやつって
せかいの　すきなところへ　いける。

あたたかい　みなみかぜに　のって　うみを　こえ
がいこくまで　とんでいってしまう　ポケモン。
つめたい　くうきに　ふれると　じめんに　おりる。

あたたかい　みなみかぜに　のって　うみを　こえ
がいこくまで　とんでいってしまう　ポケモン。
つめたい　くうきに　ふれると　じめんに　おりる。

계절풍에 날려서
세계 일주를 해 버린다.
도중에 솜 포자를 흩뿌린다.

어떤 바람이 불더라도
솜털을 자유자재로 조종하여
세계의 좋아하는 곳으로 갈 수 있다.

따뜻한 남풍을 타고 바다를 건너
외국까지 날아가는 포켓몬이다.
차가운 공기에 닿으면 땅에 내려온다.

따뜻한 남풍을 타고 바다를 건너
외국까지 날아가는 포켓몬이다.
차가운 공기에 닿으면 땅에 내려온다.

Poussé par les vents saisonniers,
il fait le tour du globe en semant
des spores de coton.

Poussé par les vents saisonniers,
il fait le tour du globe en semant
des spores de coton.

Poussé par les vents saisonniers, il fait le tour
du globe en semant des spores de coton.

Même sous un vent très violent, il contrôle sa
destination en bougeant ses appendices.

Cotovol traverse la mer, porté par les vents, pour découvrir
de nouveaux territoires. Ce Pokémon se rapproche du sol
quand le vent est trop froid.

Cotovol traverse la mer, porté par les vents, pour découvrir
de nouveaux territoires. Ce Pokémon se rapproche du sol
quand le vent est trop froid.

Es lässt sich von den Winden um den Globus tragen
und verteilt auf seinem Flug Baumwollsamen.

Auch im stärksten Wind kann es kontrollieren,
wo seine Saat auf dem Erdball niedergehen soll.

Papungha nutzt den Südwind, um das Meer zu überqueren und
in ferne Länder zu fliegen. Dieses Pokémon sinkt zu Boden,
wenn es während seines Fluges auf kalte Luftschichten stößt.

Papungha nutzt den Südwind, um das Meer zu überqueren und
in ferne Länder zu fliegen. Dieses Pokémon sinkt zu Boden,
wenn es während seines Fluges auf kalte Luftschichten stößt.

Die Baumwollsamen, die Papungha verstreut,
machen Allergikern das Leben schwer.

Mit seinen Fallschirmchen lässt es sich vom
Wind tragen. Bei günstigen Luftströmungen
kommt es schneller als Vogel-Pokémon voran.

Los vientos estacionales lo llevan por todo el mundo,
donde va soltando sus esporas.

Aunque sople el viento más fuerte, es capaz de
controlar los pompones y moverse por donde quiera.

Jumpluff se vale de los cálidos vientos del sur para volar a
tierras lejanas. Si llega a zonas de aire frío en pleno vuelo,
descenderá y tomará tierra.

Jumpluff se vale de los cálidos vientos del sur para volar a
tierras lejanas. Si llega a zonas de aire frío en pleno vuelo,
descenderá y tomará tierra.

Sospinto dai venti stagionali, gira intorno al globo
sparpagliando i suoi semi simili al cotone.

Anche nel vento forte controlla abilmente il suo
batuffolo per volare in ogni parte del mondo.

Jumpluff si affida alle correnti d’aria calda per attraversare
il mare e volare verso terre lontane. Questo Pokémon
ridiscende a terra quando incontra una corrente fredda
mentre fluttua.

Jumpluff si affida alle correnti d’aria calda per attraversare
il mare e volare verso terre lontane. Questo Pokémon
ridiscende a terra quando incontra una corrente fredda
mentre fluttua.

Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

Drifts on seasonal
winds and spreads
its cotton-like spores all over
the world to make
more offspring.

Even in the fierc­
est wind, it can
control its fluff to make its way to
any place in the
world it wants.

JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds to
cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.
The POKéMON descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is
floating.

JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds to
cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.
The POKéMON descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is
floating.

JUMPLUFF ride warm southern winds to
cross the sea and fly to foreign lands.
This POKéMON lands when it encounters
cold air while it is floating.

It drifts on seasonal winds and spreads
its cotton-like spores all over the world 
to make more offspring.

Once it catches the wind, it deftly
controls its cotton-puff spores to float,
even around the world.

Blown by seasonal winds, it
circles the globe, scattering
cotton spores as it goes.

Blown by seasonal winds, it
circles the globe, scattering
cotton spores as it goes.

Blown by seasonal winds, it
circles the globe, scattering
cotton spores as it goes.

Once it catches the wind, it deftly
controls its cotton-puff spores--
it can even float around the world.

cotton spores as it goes.

Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe,

Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to
make its way to any place in the world it wants.

Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to
foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it
encounters cold air while it is floating.
